title: Kim and Khloe Kardashian slam Kris Jenner's 'campy' Met Gala outfit
text:
Kim and Khloe didn't hold back.

Kris Jenner has long been the recipient of jokes and criticism from her brood of six children but on Sunday's episode of Keeping Up With the Kardashians, two of her girls let it rip when it came to her clothes.

The episode filmed prior to this year's camp themed Met Gala and the 63-year-old gave daughters Kim Kardashian west, 38 and Khloe Kardashian, 35, a sneak peek at her look.

Judgmental: Kim and Khloe Kardashian savagely tore apart their mom's Met Gala ensemble when they got a sneak peek at the look during Sunday night's episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians

Kris was prepared for backlash and when she showed the girls snaps from her fitting on her iPhone she tried to mitigate their anticipated judgment.

'It's supposed to be campy and wild,' she said, reminding them of the theme. 'Think David Bowie.

The family matriarch described her look as 'Elton John-meets-Liberace-meets-Andy Warhol-meets-Studio 54.'

Her daughters weren't buying it and immediately became officers in the fashion police - commenting on everything from her stomach pooch to her purse choice.

Demanding! The girls forced their mom to show them snaps from her Met Gala fitting on her phone and they didn't hold back opinions

'It's supposed to be campy and wild,' she said, reminding them of the theme this year. 'Think David Bowie.

Too honest? Kris Jenner has long been the recipient of jokes and criticism from her brood of six children

'I need to see this in person cause you don’t want to have a big FUPA', the Good American owner told her mom using a slang term for a lower tummy pooch.

'I don’t want you to have a FUPA,' she continued while looking at the shots. 'Look at this. What is this? And who do you think you are?'

Kim chimed in with an indictment of her mom's gaudy handbag choice.

'Honestly, if I sent this to Kanye, I think he might have a heart attack,' the KKW Beauty mogul said.

The look: Kris described her custom Tommy Hilfiger look as 'Elton John-meets-Liberace-meets-Andy Warhol-meets-Studio 54'

'I need to see this in person cause you don’t want to have a big FUPA', the Good American owner told her mom using a slang term for a lower tummy pooch

'I don’t want you to have a FUPA,' Khloe continued while looking at the shots. 'Look at this. What is this? And who do you think you are?'

'Honestly, if I sent this to Kanye, I think he might have a heart attack,' Kim threatened.

Kanye, a successful fashion designer in his own right, infamously transformed Kim's style when they first got together and always has a hand in her looks.

'Don't send it to Kanye,' her mother intoned.

'Thank God we saw these photos, mom,' Khloe opined.

'We literally just saved your life,' Kim added.

Bold claims: The girls said the 'literally just saved' their mom's life with their fashion advice

All in stride! Kris seemed not to take the hate personally and ultimately wore the look on the red carpet

BTS: The entire episode circled around the family's preparations around fashion's biggest night

Kris ultimately wore her campy Bowie inspired custom Tommy Hilfiger look to the annual high brow event but did heed the advice not to bring the handbag.

The entire episode circled around the family's preparations around fashion's biggest night.

Kris, Kim, Kylie and Kendall were all in attendance this year - as well as their respective partners at the time, Corey Gamble, Kanye West and now-ex Travis Scott.

Kendall went solo and sisters Khloe and Kourtney didn't make it on the guest list.
description: Kim and Khloe Kardashian savagely tore apart their mom's Met Gala ensemble when they got a sneak peek at the look during Sunday night's episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians.
